full_summary:
===========================================

### Tender Cancelled: PW-22-01011782

**Tender Announced On:** October 28, 2022 [[Publication Date](#publication-date)]

**Tender Closing Date:** December 2, 2022 [[Tender Closing Date](#tender-closing-date)]

**Contract Value:** Not Specified

### Contract Details

* **Procurement Category:** SRVTGD
* **Procurement Method:** **Competitive - Open bidding** (Concurrentielle - Invitation ouverte à soumissionner)
* **Trade Agreements:** Comply with the following trade agreements: Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement

**Requirements and Preferences:**

* GSIN (nIBS) Code: **JX9999**
* Description of Requirements: **Miscellaneous Items - Repairs** (Articles divers - réparation)
* Geographic Scope (Regions of Opportunity and Delivery): The contract area includes Canada and Ontario (except NCR).

### Contracting Authority
The contracting authority is:

* **Royal Canadian Mounted Police (Gendarmerie royale du Canada)**
  Address:
  73, promenade Leikin, Ottawa, Ontario, K1A 0R2, Canada

### Contact Information

If you have any questions or concerns regarding this contract notice, please contact:

* **Connie Wright**
    Email: [connie.wright@rcmp-grc.gc.ca](mailto:connie.wright@rcmp-grc.gc.ca)
    Phone: 613-791-9647
    Alternatively, inquiries may be submitted through the following postal address:
73 Leikin Drive, Ottawa, ON, K1A 0R2, Canada.

### Notice Status

* **Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (Demande de propositions)
* **Notice Status:** **This notice has been cancelled (Annulé)** [Further information is not available].
